name: BSOTD004
description:
This is an original photograph of a bromeliad re-photographed on a white unibody MacBook with a broken screen.

I am a professional laptop refurbisher, and I make art using broken computers.  This is a series of 100 NFTs over 100 days, all broken screens, all 1/1!  I don’t know if this will be successful, but I’m inspired by the idea of working on art daily in order to build momentum.  I have shelves of broken screens I have collected, so this will be a way to force myself to photograph them.

To provide context for the images, I will occasionally post ancillary photos of the broken devices involved on Twitter @rdklinc.  I will mint on a daily basis and at a random time.  I generally avoid apps and effects, using only minor color correction, and I often put my own photography behind the broken screens to bring out the colors.  

Thanks for looking!
